poem.title: Bebop
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Ee ree reed creed screed scree sri see The sea'd have receded if seeded with stone If stoned and sere seared. What speed speared Steed steered. Sri Lingam (Holy Wullie) smeared With butter sneered a prayer as something Juddered against the wall that screened him Seethed and screamed. He might have steeled himself And skiied to hell on all those drifts of seed that Seemed that seamed to powder off like chastened snaw, but naw. The crystal Cree.
